RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 9500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAINTED RARE speed, held on. POSSIBILITEASE broke out, late surge. TRUE solid try. J BEST PRINCESS bobbled, game effort. HIGH SIX JESS bobbled, erratic, outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: J Best Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Painted Rare
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, held on

ENTRY.NAME: True
ENTRY.COMMENT: solid try

ENTRY.NAME: High Six Jess
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, erratic, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Possibilitease
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, late surge

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 42. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMA HAPPY DANCER went to the front to co-lead from the two path to the five sixteenths then edged away and drew off in the stretch. WHEREDIDITGO had no early speed while racing four wide to the turn then tipped in to save ground around the turn, moved back out to four wide in upper stretch and dueled inside of DESERT PEPPER in the stretch, inched away late to prove second best. DESERT PEPPER was off the pace on the backstretch, fell back on the turn but moved out to five wide in upper stretch and dueled outside of WHEREDIDITGO and kept on to be best of the rest. SNOOZY SUZY rushed up the rail to co-lead on the inside to the five sixteenths pole and weakened at the eighth pole and tired late. COMFORTWITHCANDY was hustled along the rail to be off the pace at the half mile marker then made a three wide bid at the three furlong marker but faltered and tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Snoozy Suzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, co-led, weakened, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Happy Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: co-led, edged away, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, fell back turn, 5wupper, stretch duel, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Comfortwithcandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, off pace, bid 3w3/8, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Wherediditgo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, saved ground turn, stretch duel, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $3500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR $5000 CLAIMING OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $6250. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6 ,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOST AMUSING sprinted to a clear lead to set all the pace, edged away in early stretch then had to dig in late to hold off the late challenge. CHUCK NAZTY was last away, roused to prompt the pace through the turn and made a late challenge on the leader but missed. THREE BALL tracked the leaders from three or four wide and made a late gain in the stretch but tired. SUEZ trailed the field while racing four wide to the turn then tipped in to save ground on the turn while moving up but lacked a late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Most Amusing
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, set pace, edged away, dug in, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Chuck Nazty
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, prompt pace, late challenge, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Three Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, 3-4w, late gain, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Suez
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 4w, saved ground turn, lacked late response,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CREATING MEMORIES went to the lead under wraps to the half mile marker then edged away going into the turn and drew off in the stretch to prove best. MISS IZZY BEE tracked the leaders down the backstretch then moved up slightly on the turn, coaxed at the quarter pole but was no match for the winner and was a clear second. WHAT A WAY TO GO was allowed to settle on the inside near the back down the backstretch then moved up from three wide on the turn and was fought gamely in the stretch to hold the show. VALDINI was off a step slow and trailed the field on the backstretch then launched a rail bid on the turn then moved out to four wide in upper stretch and was gained ground on the turn but was empty in the stretch. SMART ACT prompted the early pace to the half mile marker then saved ground around the turn and gave way. PASSION RIDE stalked the pace from the inside through the turn then dropped back and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: What a Way to Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3wturn, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Valdini
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, trailed, rail bid turn, 4wupper, gain ground, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Passion Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, dropped back, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Creating Memories
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, edged away, drew off, best

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Act
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt early pace, saved ground turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Izzy Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, bid 1/4, no match, clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TULSA TIME went to a clear lead to set all the pace and was kept to task in the stretch. MAIUS was off the early pace then was allowed to settled down the backstretch, made a three wide bid at the three furlong marker but was no match for the winner. MEET JOE stalked the pace from the inside but didn't make a bid and flattened out. AVALON KING prompted the pace down the backstretch then made a mild bid at the three furlong marker and tired in the stretch. TRICKY LEE was always near the back. JU JU GUY trailed the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Ju Ju Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Meet Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, no bid, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Tricky Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: always near back

ENTRY.NAME: Tulsa Time
ENTRY.OWNER: Vicchrilli Russell and McGregor Lynne M
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, set pace, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Maius
ENTRY.COMMENT: off early pace, allowed to settle, 3w3/8, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Avalon King
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, mild bid 3/8, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 7200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BORN TO RACE roused between horsed at the nine sixteenths pole to be off the pace, tipped in at the half mile marker to save ground around the turn and took command at the quarter pole and drew off. CREDIT RATING had brief early speed then allowed to settle down the backstretch and had to check slightly at the half mile marker, made a rail bid on into the stretch to prove second best. TREASURE COAST hustled along to prompt the pace from three wide then made a three wide bid into upper stretch but lacked a late response. HOLY MISSION went to an unchallenged lead to the five sixteenths pole then was eclipsed at the quarter pole, was game in early stretch and weakened. TEQUILA was fractious in the gate, trailed the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Credit Rating
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, allowed to settle, slight check 1/2, rail bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Born to Race
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused between, off pace, took command 1/4, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, trailed, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Treasure Coast
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, prompt pace, 3wupper, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: unchallenged lead, eclipsed 1/4, gamely, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 14500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWBOY DON was off the pace to the half mile marker then fell back around the turn, moved out to six wide in upper stretch and made a late rally to just get up for the win. SAVILE ROW raced near the back then made a mild bid on the turn, moved between horses at the sixteenth pole for a late surged and missed. TEXAS HEDGE trailed the field on the backstretch then made a four wide bid at the seven sixteenths pole and kept on to take the lead at the eighth pole but was caught late. I SEE CLEARLY NOW raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch, fell back on the turn while racing four wide then made a mid track rally in the stretch. MORE HONOR raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then trailed the field into the stretch but made a late surge to improve position. ONE STEP AWAY dueled for the lead from three wide then inched away on the turn to take a brief lead at the quarter pole, drifted in at the top of the stretch and gave way. CHAMPS SUCCESS tracked the leader from four wide around the turn then engaged leaders at the top of the stretch and tired. TW SKIPPING STONES rushed up to duel for the lead from the inside to the quarter pole then bumped with PRECEDENT entering the stretch and gave way. PRECEDENT dueled for the lead from two wide to the quarter pole, bumped with TW SKIPPING STONES entering the stretch and tired. A STEWARD INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE RUNNING AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH, ALONG WITH A JOCKEY OBJECTION, THE JOCKEY OF TW SKIPPING STONES CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF ONE STEP AWAY FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AFTER THE QUARTER POLE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Tw Skipping Stones
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, dueled for lead, bumped, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Precedent
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, bumped, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Savile Row
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, mild bid turn, between 1/16, late run, missed

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, led briefly, drift in, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboy Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 6wupper, late rally, just up

ENTRY.NAME: More Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, trailed, late surge, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Hedge
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, 4w7/16, lead 1/8, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: I See Clearly Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, fell back turn, 4wturn, mid track rally

ENTRY.NAME: Champs Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders 4w, engaged leaders, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIGHT TO SUE was away alertly, headed at the half mile marker and dueled from two wide around the turn, fended off the inside rival but was rechallenged at the top of the stretch and battled down the stretch, drifted out and brushed with DOCS CARO CAT in the final yard but held on. DOCS CARO CAT vied for the lead from three wide and engaged the leader at the three sixteenths pole, battled down the stretch outside of leader, was brushed by RIGHT TO SUE in the final yards and fought gamely but missed. BRAVO KOLT was off the pace through the turn then showed late effort to be up for the show. BIGPARTY NOWHISKEY rushed up the rail to take the lead at the half mile marker then dueled around the turn and weakened. SECRET SURVIVOR saved ground while racing near the back, angled out at the quarter pole to make a mid track rally. BARTSTER vied for the lead from three wide to the half mile marker and retreated. BARLOWS PRIDE hopped at start and trailed. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF DOCS CARO CAT CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF RIGHT TO SUE FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN LATE STRETCH, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Barlows Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Survivor
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out 1/4, mid track rally

ENTRY.NAME: Bigparty Nowhiskey
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, led 1/2, duel turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bravo Kolt
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, late effort, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Docs Caro Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w, engaged leader 3/16, stretch duel, brushed, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Bartster
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Right to Sue
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled, drift out, brushed, held on
